titles.title: To direct the Administrator of the Small Business Administration to redesignate the branch office of the Administration located in Melville, New York, as a district office.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Small Business.

bill.summary: 3/8/1999--Introduced. Directs the Administrator of the Small Business Administration (SBA) to redesignate the SBA branch office in Melville, New York, as a district office.
